data.name: 大戦略SSB - 竹島攻防戦セット
data.detailed_description:
It is a paid additional content of the latest work of the strategy war simulation series "Daisenryaku SSB" (Windows® 11/10 / 8.1).
With the theme of "Hot summer in the Far East in 2022", this product is a set of a scenario map "Takeshima Battle" that depicts the clash between Japan and South Korea over Takeshima, and additional weapons that have not appeared in the main story of Japan and the United States. ..

◆ Newly added scenario "Battle of Takeshima" ◆

Japan, which has been fighting with South Korea over Takeshima since the establishment of the "Syngman Rhee Line," prepared a proceeding to the International Court of Justice to settle the matter.
South Korea, which sensed this, conducted a long-term large-scale military exercise in the waters near Takeshima.
Japan had no choice but to dispatch troops to the area in order to curb this outrage.

◆ List of newly added weapons ◆


・ A-10 Thunderbolt II
・ AH-1 Cobra
・ UH-1 Iroquois
・ Type 74 tank
・ Type 73 armored car
・ M113
・ Striker ATGM
・ Type 19 wheeled self-propelled howitzer
・ HIMARS
・ Type 11 short-range ground-to-air guided bullet
・ Type 93 short-range surface-to-air missile
・ Asahi
・ Kongo
・ Murasame
・ Zumwalt
・ Hyuga
・ Oyashio
・ Sea Wolf

data.short_description: It is a paid additional content of the latest work of the strategy war simulation series "Daisenryaku SSB" (Windows® 7, 8, 10). The additional paid content is a set of a scenario map with the theme of "Hot summer in the Far East in 2022" and weapons that have not appeared in the main story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows®11/10/8.1
  • Processor: Core i3 and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows®11/10/8.1
  • Processor: Core i3 and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
